segments.text: Yes . I have to stay in your cry for just one day , can you suggest a short tour ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you interested in the natural landscape or the human landscape ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would prefer the first one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . We have a one-day trip along the river . It's quite beautiful .
segments.speaker: S1
